The Summer Bridge Program is fast approaching!

This program is MANDATORY for ALL rising 9th grade students and NEW TO THE SCHOOL rising 10th grade students. It is geared towards assisting students academically and culturally as they transition to high school.

ORIENTATION for the Summer Bridge Program is on SATURDAY, June 29th from 9am - 11am. This orientation is for both parents AND students to attend. All new enrollees MUST come providing their:
-- Final Report Card from previous school year
-- Transcript from former school
-- All health forms
-- If you have not provided proof of DC residency, please bring appropriate documentation at this time and come to our admissions office.

The Summer Bridge Program will take place MONDAY, July 1st through FRIDAY, July 12th from 12:30pm - 4:30pm. There is NO program on July 4th.

This is an important and exciting program for ALL 9th grade students and NEW TO THE SCHOOL 10th grade students to attend! We look forward to seeing you there!
